title: Pixel 4A 5G Dropping Connections
content:
Got the T-Mobile Pixel 4a 5G yesterday.  The device is consistently dropping connections - both mobile network and WiFi are seemingly losing signal and reconnecting multiple times a minute.  If I restart my phone, it stays solid for about 3-5 minutes and then begins the cycle again. 

So far, I've done a full system reset, reset my home network (Nest Wifi with 40+ devices connected with no issues) and swapped SIMs from a different phone that was working to rule that out.  I also took the SIM from the Pixel and moved it into another phone and it retained the connection with no issue.  

Everything points to a bug or issue with my hardware.
